name: Devilman
overview: Devilman is a game for the Sony PlayStation and Windows 98, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2000. The game is divided into two parts with drastically different gameplay. Chapter one is a survival horror with lots of running, hiding and puzzles, while chapter two is a "beat 'em up" with minor puzzle elements. Chapter three consists of one boss fight with gameplay mechanics similar to chapter two.
